version_description:
- Fixed bug with lost attachment in transfer transaction!!!
- Autoupdate balances and transactions
- Added Transaction Id in detail view
- Other small bugfixes

- Fixed bug with lost attachment in transfer transaction!!!
- Autoupdate balances and transactions
- Added Transaction Id in detail view
- Other small bugfixes

- Fixed bug with lost attachment in transfer transaction!!!
- Autoupdate balances and transactions
- Added Transaction Id in detail view
- Other small bugfixes

- Fixed critical bug with the misleading description for "Encoded seed" switch at the "Import Wallet" screen. 
It should be called "Base58-encoded format". Because all seeds are ALWAYS stored in the encrypted format.
Please update!!!

- Fixed critical bug with the misleading description for "Encoded seed" switch at the "Import Wallet" screen. 
It should be called "Base58-encoded format". Because all seeds are ALWAYS stored in the encrypted format.
Please update!!!

- Fixed critical bug with the misleading description for "Encoded seed" switch at the "Import Wallet" screen. 
It should be called "Base58-encoded format". Because all seeds are ALWAYS stored in the encrypted format.
Please update!!!

The Decentralised Exchange (DEX) has now been added to the iOS Waves client, so you can trade on the go!
•    Add your favorite trading pairs
•    Easy-to-use orderbook
•    Interactive chart with customisable timeframe, last price, and volumes
•    Place new orders and cancel existing ones.
•    Recent trades history

The Decentralised Exchange (DEX) has now been added to the iOS Waves client, so you can trade on the go!
•    Add your favorite trading pairs
•    Easy-to-use orderbook
•    Interactive chart with customisable timeframe, last price, and volumes
•    Place new orders and cancel existing ones.
•    Recent trades history

The Decentralised Exchange (DEX) has now been added to the iOS Waves client, so you can trade on the go!

•    Easy-to-use orderbook

•    Place new orders and cancel existing ones.
•    Recent trades history

- Added new gateway assets to the general section
- A few small bug-fixes

Long-awaited update!
Version 2.0.0
-
Unfortunately, we are using an old version of DEX API in this release, which can be slower than expected.
We are working to resolve this and replace the API to improve performance.

It’s completely redesigned official Waves application. 
Version 2.0

In this update:
- Reworked UI/UX
- Gateways support
- Improved Address Book
- Improved security
- Added WAVES Leasing feature
- Added tab for sharing account information: Aliases, QR code.
- Fully reworked transaction display layout
- Added spam protection
- Support for 10 languages
- Token burning
- Extended asset info display
- Added device pairing feature

It’s completely redesigned official Waves application. 
Version 2.0

In this update:
- Reworked UI/UX
- Gateways support
- Improved Address Book
- Improved security
- Added WAVES Leasing feature
- Added tab for sharing account information: Aliases, QR code.
- Fully reworked transaction display layout
- Added spam protection
- Support for 10 languages
- Token burning
- Extended asset info display
- Added device pairing feature

It’s completely redesigned official Waves application. 
Version 2.0

In this update:
- Reworked UI/UX
- Gateways support
- Improved Address Book
- Improved security
- Added WAVES Leasing feature
- Added tab for sharing account information: Aliases, QR code.
- Fully reworked transaction display layout
- Added spam protection
- Support for 10 languages
- Token burning
- Extended asset info display
- Added device pairing feature

- Improved DEX speed
- Improved Touch/Face ID access functionality
- Improved overall stability of application
- Added asset ordering function
- Added Turkish and Brazilian Portuguese languages support
- Added ability to re-send transaction details
- Fixed bug blocking some users from updating balances
- Fixed bugs in sorting of assets and importing accounts
- Fixed minor bugs in localisation
- Fixed minor UI and spam filter bugs Send, Receive, Trade on DEX

The updated app has improved overall performance. We've added support displaying for InvokeScript, and reworked the logic and design of sorting tokens. The improved design means tokens can now be conveniently viewed and searched on the main screen, with suspicious assets placed in a separate list. The app now displays precise executed trading volumes. We have fixed the grammar for localised versions and improved the phrasing of messages in the interface, making it more familiar to users, as well as adding French language support!

Thank you for your feedback and suggestions!
We are grateful for your opinions and will aim to make the app even better.

Waves Mobile team

In this update we included a VST gateway and added support for payment of trading fees in BTC and ETH. We have also improved the overall performance of the application and fixed several bugs.

Thank you for your feedback and suggestions!
We are grateful for your opinions and will aim to improve the app further.

In this release, we’ve added a mobile version of Waves Keeper and integrated an SDK to work with it. Mobile Keeper works only with mobile apps. We’ve also added a handy widget with token exchange rates to the mobile client. The app also now offers the ERGO token gateway, plus improved searching for DEX and sorting pairs. Additionally, we’ve improved overall app performance and fixed various bugs.

Thank you for your feedback and suggestions!
We are grateful for your opinions and will aim to improve the app further.

Waves Mobile team

We’ve finished the secure migration to Waves.Exchange. Also, in this update, we’ve added market orders so you can quickly buy or sell tokens at the best available price. 

Thank you for your feedback and suggestions!
We are grateful for your opinions and will aim to improve the app further.

We’ve improved the Trade screen. Categories and filters for pairs, a USDN equivalent price for each token pair, and monthly and weekly candlesticks have been added.

In the detailed information for each token, you can now check the rate and price change for the last 24 hours against USDN.

We’ve optimized caching and setting of tickers to tokens. We’ve also added the ability to instantly trade your token.

Thank you for your feedback and suggestions!
We are grateful for your opinions and will aim to improve the app further.

Neutrino staking has been integrated to enable IOS users to generate high passive income. We wish you good earnings!

Buying USDN with the card is now available.

Support chat has been integrated into the application for your convenience.

Other fixes and improvements.

We have finally updated the interface of your wallet and divided the tokens into verified and unverified. Now you can easily distinguish the tokens created by the community from the Gateway, DeFi and WA Verified tokens. We've also added the diagram and the approximate cost of your current portfolio to the top of the screen. To change the currency just tap on the $ icon.

We have finally updated the interface of your wallet and divided the tokens into verified and unverified. Now you can easily distinguish the tokens created by the community from the Gateway, DeFi and WA Verified tokens. We've also added the diagram and the approximate cost of your current portfolio to the top of the screen. To change the currency just tap on the $ icon.

We have finally updated the interface of your wallet and divided the tokens into verified and unverified. Now you can easily distinguish the tokens created by the community from the Gateway, DeFi and WA Verified tokens. We've also added the diagram and the approximate cost of your current portfolio to the top of the screen. To change the currency just tap on the $ icon.

A new trading fee system is now live!

This release will facilitate a significant increase in the size of governance fee rewards, boosting the WX token's profitability. 

Two types of fees have been introduced:

• A percentage fee for the most liquid token pairs. It will be 0.1% of the exchange transaction's amount, but no lower than the equivalent of 0.01 WAVES. The percentage fee will be charged in the asset you spend. 
• A fixed fee of 0.01 WAVES for other pairs. 

We remind you that you can get a 50% discount if you pay fees in WX tokens.
